mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `list` (name, sex, department, email, birthday, telephone, skill, educational, address) values(#{name}, #{sex}, #{department}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{telephone}, #{skill}, #{educational}, #{address});
mapper.update: update `list` set sex = #{sex},department = #{department},email = #{email},birthday = #{birthday},telephone = #{telephone},skill = #{skill}, educational = #{educational},address = #{address} where name = #{name};
